title: What is your review of Homeopathy?
description: Answer (1 of 46): No, I do not. It is an entirely made up system that has no possible scientific method of working, despite all the special pleading you hear from homeopaths who should do us all a service and use their obvious considerable skills to become actual doctors and help relieve the chro...
